verses.verse: וְעָשָׂה֩ <S%H6213><s%> ve-'a-Sah Then wrought בְצַלְאֵ֨ל <S%H1212><s%> ve-tzal-'El Bezaleel וְאָהֳלִיאָ֜ב <S%H171><s%> ve-'o-ho-li-'Av and Aholiab וְכֹ֣ל׀ <S%H3605><s%> ve-Chol and every אִ֣ישׁ <S%H376><s%> 'ish man חֲכַם־ <S%H2450><s%> cha-cham- and every wise לֵ֗ב <S%H3820><s%> Lev, hearted אֲשֶׁר֩ <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher whom נָתַ֨ן <S%H5414><s%> na-Tan put יְהוָ֜ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh the LORD חָכְמָ֤ה <S%H2451><s%> choch-mah wisdom וּתְבוּנָה֙ <S%H8394><s%> u-te-vu-Nah and understanding בָּהֵ֔מָּה <S%H1992><s%> ba-Hem-mah, in whom לָדַ֣עַת <S%H3045><s%> la-Da-'at to know לַעֲשֹׂ֔ת <S%H6213><s%> la-'a-Sot, how to work אֶֽת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- all מְלֶ֖אכֶת <S%H4399><s%> me-Le-chet all manner of work עֲבֹדַ֣ת <S%H5656><s%> 'a-vo-Dat for the service הַקֹּ֑דֶשׁ <S%H6944><s%> hak-Ko-desh; of the sanctuary לְכֹ֥ל <S%H3605><s%> le-Chol all אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher- whom צִוָּ֖ה <S%H6680><s%> tziv-Vah had commanded יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh. according to all that the LORD

וַיִּקְרָ֣א <S%H7121><s%> vai-yik-Ra called מֹשֶׁ֗ה <S%H4872><s%> mo-Sheh, And Moses אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- about בְּצַלְאֵל֮ <S%H1212><s%> be-tzal-'El Bezaleel וְאֶל־ <S%H413><s%> ve-'el- and אָֽהֳלִיאָב֒ <S%H171><s%> 'o-ho-li-'Av and Aholiab וְאֶל֙ <S%H413><s%> ve-'El and כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- every אִ֣ישׁ <S%H376><s%> 'ish man חֲכַם־ <S%H2450><s%> cha-cham- and every wise לֵ֔ב <S%H3820><s%> Lev, hearted אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher whom נָתַ֧ן <S%H5414><s%> na-Tan had put יְהוָ֛ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh the LORD חָכְמָ֖ה <S%H2451><s%> choch-mah wisdom בְּלִבּ֑וֹ <S%H3820><s%> be-lib-Bo; in whose heart כֹּ֚ל <S%H3605><s%> kol everyone אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher whose נְשָׂא֣וֹ <S%H5375><s%> ne-sa-'O stirred him up לִבּ֔וֹ <S%H3820><s%> lib-Bo, [even] every one whose heart לְקָרְבָ֥ה <S%H7126><s%> le-ka-re-Vah to come אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to הַמְּלָאכָ֖ה <S%H4399><s%> ham-me-la-Chah unto the work לַעֲשֹׂ֥ת <S%H6213><s%> la-'a-Sot to do אֹתָֽהּ׃ <S%H853><s%> 'o-Tah.

וַיִּקְח֞וּ <S%H3947><s%> vai-yik-Chu And they received מִלִּפְנֵ֣י <S%H6440><s%> mil-lif-Nei of מֹשֶׁ֗ה <S%H4872><s%> mo-Sheh, Moses אֵ֤ת <S%H853><s%> 'et כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- all הַתְּרוּמָה֙ <S%H8641><s%> hat-te-ru-Mah all the offering אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher which הֵבִ֜יאוּ <S%H935><s%> he-Vi-'u had brought בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> be-Nei which the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֗ל <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El, of Israel לִמְלֶ֛אכֶת <S%H4399><s%> lim-Le-chet for the work עֲבֹדַ֥ת <S%H5656><s%> 'a-vo-Dat of the service הַקֹּ֖דֶשׁ <S%H6944><s%> hak-Ko-desh of the sanctuary לַעֲשֹׂ֣ת <S%H6213><s%> la-'a-Sot to make אֹתָ֑הּ <S%H853><s%> 'o-Tah; וְ֠הֵם <S%H1992><s%> Ve-hem like הֵבִ֨יאוּ <S%H935><s%> he-Vi-'u it [withal] And they brought אֵלָ֥יו <S%H413><s%> 'e-Lav and ע֛וֹד <S%H5750><s%> od still נְדָבָ֖ה <S%H5071><s%> ne-da-Vah yet unto him free offerings בַּבֹּ֥קֶר <S%H1242><s%> bab-Bo-ker every morning בַּבֹּֽקֶר׃ <S%H1242><s%> bab-Bo-ker. morning

וַיָּבֹ֙אוּ֙ <S%H935><s%> vai-ya-Vo-'u came כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- and all הַ֣חֲכָמִ֔ים <S%H2450><s%> ha-cha-cha-Mim, And all the wise men הָעֹשִׂ֕ים <S%H6213><s%> ha-'o-Sim that wrought אֵ֖ת <S%H853><s%> 'et כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- all מְלֶ֣אכֶת <S%H4399><s%> me-Le-chet all the work הַקֹּ֑דֶשׁ <S%H6944><s%> hak-Ko-desh; of the sanctuary אִֽישׁ־ <S%H376><s%> 'ish- every man אִ֥ישׁ <S%H376><s%> 'ish each מִמְּלַאכְתּ֖וֹ <S%H4399><s%> mi-me-lach-To from his work אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher- which הֵ֥מָּה <S%H1992><s%> Hem-mah like עֹשִֽׂים׃ <S%H6213><s%> 'o-Sim. which they made

וַיֹּאמְרוּ֙ <S%H559><s%> vai-yo-me-Ru And they spake אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to מֹשֶׁ֣ה <S%H4872><s%> mo-Sheh unto Moses לֵּאמֹ֔ר <S%H559><s%> le-Mor, saying מַרְבִּ֥ים <S%H7235><s%> mar-Bim much more הָעָ֖ם <S%H5971><s%> ha-'Am The people לְהָבִ֑יא <S%H935><s%> le-ha-Vi; bring מִדֵּ֤י <S%H1767><s%> mid-Dei than enough הָֽעֲבֹדָה֙ <S%H5656><s%> ha-'a-vo-Dah for the service לַמְּלָאכָ֔ה <S%H4399><s%> lam-me-la-Chah, of the work אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher- which צִוָּ֥ה <S%H6680><s%> tziv-Vah commanded יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh which the LORD לַעֲשֹׂ֥ת <S%H6213><s%> la-'a-Sot to make אֹתָֽהּ׃ <S%H853><s%> 'o-Tah.

וַיְצַ֣ו <S%H6680><s%> vay-Tzav gave commandment מֹשֶׁ֗ה <S%H4872><s%> mo-Sheh, And Moses וַיַּעֲבִ֨ירוּ <S%H5674><s%> vai-ya-'a-Vi-ru was circulated ק֥וֹל <S%H6963><s%> Kol proclamation בַּֽמַּחֲנֶה֮ <S%H4264><s%> bam-ma-cha-Neh throughout the camp לֵאמֹר֒ <S%H559><s%> le-Mor saying אִ֣ישׁ <S%H376><s%> 'ish Let neither man וְאִשָּׁ֗ה <S%H802><s%> ve-'ish-Shah, nor woman אַל־ <S%H408><s%> 'al- no יַעֲשׂוּ־ <S%H6213><s%> ya-'a-su- make ע֛וֹד <S%H5750><s%> od any מְלָאכָ֖ה <S%H4399><s%> me-la-Chah any more work לִתְרוּמַ֣ת <S%H8641><s%> lit-ru-Mat for the offering הַקֹּ֑דֶשׁ <S%H6944><s%> hak-Ko-desh; of the sanctuary וַיִּכָּלֵ֥א <S%H3607><s%> vai-yik-ka-Le were restrained הָעָ֖ם <S%H5971><s%> ha-'Am So the people מֵהָבִֽיא׃ <S%H935><s%> me-ha-Vi. from bringing

וְהַמְּלָאכָ֗ה <S%H4399><s%> ve-ham-me-la-Chah, For the stuff הָיְתָ֥ה <S%H1961><s%> ha-ye-Tah had דַיָּ֛ם <S%H1767><s%> dai-Yam they had was sufficient לְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> le-chol for all הַמְּלָאכָ֖ה <S%H4399><s%> ham-me-la-Chah for all the work לַעֲשׂ֣וֹת <S%H6213><s%> la-'a-Sot to make אֹתָ֑הּ <S%H853><s%> 'o-Tah; וְהוֹתֵֽר׃ <S%H3498><s%> ve-ho-Ter. it and too much ס sa-Mek

וַיַּעֲשׂ֨וּ <S%H6213><s%> vai-ya-'a-Su among them that wrought כָל־ <S%H3605><s%> chol All חֲכַם־ <S%H2450><s%> cha-cham- And every wise לֵ֜ב <S%H3820><s%> lev hearted man בְּעֹשֵׂ֧י <S%H6213><s%> be-'o-Sei made הַמְּלָאכָ֛ה <S%H4399><s%> ham-me-la-Chah the work אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הַמִּשְׁכָּ֖ן <S%H4908><s%> ham-mish-Kan of the tabernacle עֶ֣שֶׂר <S%H6235><s%> 'E-ser ten יְרִיעֹ֑ת <S%H3407><s%> ye-ri-'Ot; curtains שֵׁ֣שׁ <S%H8336><s%> shesh linen מָשְׁזָ֗ר <S%H7806><s%> ma-she-Zar, [of] fine twined וּתְכֵ֤לֶת <S%H8504><s%> u-te-Che-let and blue וְאַרְגָּמָן֙ <S%H713><s%> ve-'ar-ga-Man and purple וְתוֹלַ֣עַת <S%H8438><s%> ve-to-La-'at oppressor שָׁנִ֔י <S%H8144><s%> sha-Ni, and scarlet כְּרֻבִ֛ים <S%H3742><s%> ke-ru-Vim [with] cherubims מַעֲשֵׂ֥ה <S%H4639><s%> ma-'a-Seh work חֹשֵׁ֖ב <S%H2803><s%> cho-Shev of cunning עָשָׂ֥ה <S%H6213><s%> 'a-Sah made אֹתָֽם׃ <S%H853><s%> 'o-Tam.

אֹ֜רֶךְ <S%H753><s%> 'O-rech The length הַיְרִיעָ֣ה <S%H3407><s%> hay-ri-'Ah curtain הָֽאַחַ֗ת <S%H259><s%> ha-'a-Chat, of one שְׁמֹנֶ֤ה <S%H8083><s%> she-mo-Neh and eight וְעֶשְׂרִים֙ <S%H6242><s%> ve-'es-Rim [was] twenty בָּֽאַמָּ֔ה <S%H520><s%> ba-'am-Mah, cubits וְרֹ֙חַב֙ <S%H7341><s%> ve-Ro-chav and the breadth אַרְבַּ֣ע <S%H702><s%> 'ar-Ba' four בָּֽאַמָּ֔ה <S%H520><s%> ba-'am-Mah, cubits הַיְרִיעָ֖ה <S%H3407><s%> hay-ri-'Ah curtain הָאֶחָ֑ת <S%H259><s%> ha-'e-Chat; of one מִדָּ֥ה <S%H4060><s%> mid-Dah size אַחַ֖ת <S%H259><s%> 'a-Chat [were] all of one לְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> le-chol all הַיְרִיעֹֽת׃ <S%H3407><s%> hay-ri-'Ot. the curtains

וַיְחַבֵּר֙ <S%H2266><s%> vay-chab-Ber And he coupled אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- חֲמֵ֣שׁ <S%H2568><s%> cha-Mesh the five הַיְרִיעֹ֔ת <S%H3407><s%> hay-ri-'Ot, curtains אַחַ֖ת <S%H259><s%> 'a-Chat one אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- and אֶחָ֑ת <S%H376><s%> 'e-Chat; he וְחָמֵ֤שׁ <S%H2568><s%> ve-cha-Mesh and [the other] five יְרִיעֹת֙ <S%H3407><s%> ye-ri-'Ot curtains חִבַּ֔ר <S%H2266><s%> chib-Bar, he coupled אַחַ֖ת <S%H259><s%> 'a-Chat unto another אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- about אֶחָֽת׃ <S%H376><s%> 'e-Chat. He

וַיַּ֜עַשׂ <S%H6213><s%> vai-Ya-'as And he made לֻֽלְאֹ֣ת <S%H3924><s%> lul-'Ot loops תְּכֵ֗לֶת <S%H8504><s%> te-Che-let, of blue עַ֣ל <S%H5921><s%> 'al on שְׂפַ֤ת <S%H8193><s%> se-Fat on the edge הַיְרִיעָה֙ <S%H3407><s%> hay-ri-'Ah curtain הָֽאֶחָ֔ת <S%H259><s%> ha-'e-Chat, of one מִקָּצָ֖ה <S%H7098><s%> mik-ka-Tzah from the selvedge בַּמַּחְבָּ֑רֶת <S%H4225><s%> bam-mach-Ba-ret; in the coupling כֵּ֤ן <S%H3651><s%> ken likewise עָשָׂה֙ <S%H6213><s%> 'a-Sah likewise he made בִּשְׂפַ֣ת <S%H8193><s%> bis-Fat side הַיְרִיעָ֔ה <S%H3407><s%> hay-ri-'Ah, of [another] curtain הַקִּ֣יצוֹנָ֔ה <S%H7020><s%> hak-Ki-tzo-Nah, in the uttermost בַּמַּחְבֶּ֖רֶת <S%H4225><s%> bam-mach-Be-ret in the coupling הַשֵּׁנִֽית׃ <S%H8145><s%> hash-she-Nit. of the second

חֲמִשִּׁ֣ים <S%H2572><s%> cha-mish-Shim Fifty לֻלָאֹ֗ת <S%H3924><s%> lu-la-'Ot, loops עָשָׂה֮ <S%H6213><s%> 'a-Sah made בַּיְרִיעָ֣ה <S%H3407><s%> bay-ri-'Ah curtain הָאֶחָת֒ <S%H259><s%> ha-'e-Chat he in one וַחֲמִשִּׁ֣ים <S%H2572><s%> va-cha-mish-Shim and fifty לֻלָאֹ֗ת <S%H3924><s%> lu-la-'Ot, loops עָשָׂה֙ <S%H6213><s%> 'a-Sah made בִּקְצֵ֣ה <S%H7097><s%> bik-Tzeh he in the edge הַיְרִיעָ֔ה <S%H3407><s%> hay-ri-'Ah, of the curtain אֲשֶׁ֖ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher after בַּמַּחְבֶּ֣רֶת <S%H4225><s%> bam-mach-Be-ret which [was] in the coupling הַשֵּׁנִ֑ית <S%H8145><s%> hash-she-Nit; of the second מַקְבִּילֹת֙ <S%H6901><s%> mak-bi-Lot held הַלֻּ֣לָאֹ֔ת <S%H3924><s%> hal-Lu-la-'Ot, the loops אַחַ֖ת <S%H259><s%> 'a-Chat one אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- about אֶחָֽת׃ <S%H259><s%> 'e-Chat. [curtain] to another

וַיַּ֕עַשׂ <S%H6213><s%> vai-Ya-'as And he made חֲמִשִּׁ֖ים <S%H2572><s%> cha-mish-Shim fifty קַרְסֵ֣י <S%H7165><s%> kar-Sei taches זָהָ֑ב <S%H2091><s%> za-Hav; of gold וַיְחַבֵּ֨ר <S%H2266><s%> vay-chab-Ber and coupled אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הַיְרִעֹ֜ת <S%H3407><s%> hay-ri-'Ot the curtains אַחַ֤ת <S%H259><s%> 'a-Chat one אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- about אַחַת֙ <S%H259><s%> 'a-Chat unto another בַּקְּרָסִ֔ים <S%H7165><s%> bak-ke-ra-Sim, with the taches וַֽיְהִ֥י <S%H1961><s%> vay-Hi become הַמִּשְׁכָּ֖ן <S%H4908><s%> ham-mish-Kan tabernacle אֶחָֽד׃ <S%H259><s%> 'e-Chad. so it became one ס sa-Mek

וַיַּ֙עַשׂ֙ <S%H6213><s%> vai-Ya-'as And he made יְרִיעֹ֣ת <S%H3407><s%> ye-ri-'Ot curtains עִזִּ֔ים <S%H5795><s%> 'iz-Zim, [of] goats' לְאֹ֖הֶל <S%H168><s%> le-'O-hel [hair] for the tent עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- over הַמִּשְׁכָּ֑ן <S%H4908><s%> ham-mish-Kan; over the tabernacle עַשְׁתֵּֽי־ <S%H6249><s%> 'ash-tei- eleven עֶשְׂרֵ֥ה <S%H6240><s%> 'es-Reh ten יְרִיעֹ֖ת <S%H3407><s%> ye-ri-'Ot curtains עָשָׂ֥ה <S%H6213><s%> 'a-Sah he made אֹתָֽם׃ <S%H853><s%> 'o-Tam.

וַיַּ֤עַשׂ <S%H6213><s%> vai-Ya-'as And he made מָסָךְ֙ <S%H4539><s%> ma-soCh an hanging לְפֶ֣תַח <S%H6607><s%> le-Fe-tach door הָאֹ֔הֶל <S%H168><s%> ha-'O-hel, for the tabernacle תְּכֵ֧לֶת <S%H8504><s%> te-Che-let [of] blue וְאַרְגָּמָ֛ן <S%H713><s%> ve-'ar-ga-Man and purple וְתוֹלַ֥עַת <S%H8438><s%> ve-to-La-'at oppressor שָׁנִ֖י <S%H8144><s%> sha-Ni and scarlet וְשֵׁ֣שׁ <S%H8336><s%> ve-Shesh linen מָשְׁזָ֑ר <S%H7806><s%> ma-she-Zar; and fine twined מַעֲשֵׂ֖ה <S%H4639><s%> ma-'a-Seh the work רֹקֵֽם׃ <S%H7551><s%> ro-Kem. of a weaver

וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et עַמּוּדָ֤יו <S%H5982><s%> 'am-mu-Dav pillars חֲמִשָּׁה֙ <S%H2568><s%> cha-mish-Shah And the five וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et וָ֣וֵיהֶ֔ם <S%H2053><s%> va-vei-Hem, of it with their hooks וְצִפָּ֧ה <S%H6823><s%> ve-tzip-Pah and he overlaid רָאשֵׁיהֶ֛ם <S%H7218><s%> ra-shei-Hem their chapiters וַחֲשֻׁקֵיהֶ֖ם <S%H2838><s%> va-cha-shu-kei-Hem and their fillets זָהָ֑ב <S%H2091><s%> za-Hav; with gold וְאַדְנֵיהֶ֥ם <S%H134><s%> ve-'ad-nei-Hem sockets חֲמִשָּׁ֖ה <S%H2568><s%> cha-mish-Shah but their five נְחֹֽשֶׁת׃ <S%H5178><s%> ne-Cho-shet. [were of] brass פ Peh
